pullrequest.title: Part 1: Move gtest from core/test to test folder

content.raw:
Got it, thanks. Locally I get the same error as pipelines when running `cmake`:

~~~
CMake Error at /usr/local/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:1324 (add_library):
  Cannot find source file:
    CXX_STANDARD
  Tried extensions .c .C .c++ .cc .cpp .cxx .m .M .mm .h .hh .h++ .hm .hpp
  .hxx .in .txx
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/local/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:1089 (_ign_add_library_or_component)
  loader/CMakeLists.txt:9 (ign_add_component)
CMake Error: CMake can not determine linker language for target: ignition-plugin0-loader
CMake Error: Cannot determine link language for target "ignition-plugin0-loader".
CMake Error: CMake can not determine linker language for target: ignition-plugin0-loader
CMake Error in loader/CMakeLists.txt:
  Exporting the target "ignition-plugin0-loader" is not allowed since its
  linker language cannot be determined
~~~

So I guess this is the expected result, i.e. it configures up to the loader.
content.html:
Got it, thanks. Locally I get the same error as pipelines when running cmake:

CMake Error at /usr/local/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:1324 (add_library):
  Cannot find source file:
    CXX_STANDARD
  Tried extensions .c .C .c++ .cc .cpp .cxx .m .M .mm .h .hh .h++ .hm .hpp
  .hxx .in .txx
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/local/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:1089 (_ign_add_library_or_component)
  loader/CMakeLists.txt:9 (ign_add_component)
CMake Error: CMake can not determine linker language for target: ignition-plugin0-loader
CMake Error: Cannot determine link language for target "ignition-plugin0-loader".
CMake Error: CMake can not determine linker language for target: ignition-plugin0-loader
CMake Error in loader/CMakeLists.txt:
  Exporting the target "ignition-plugin0-loader" is not allowed since its
  linker language cannot be determined

So I guess this is the expected result, i.e. it configures up to the loader.
